parameters.name: ComputeResource
parameters.description:
The amount of reserved computing resources.
Valid values: 0ACU to 4096ACU. Step size: 16. Each AnalyticDB compute unit (ACU) is approximately equal to 1 core and 4 GB memory.

parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster.

parameters.name: ShardNumber
parameters.description: The number of shards that you want to change during the data migration.

parameters.name: StorageResource
parameters.description:
The amount of reserved storage resources. Valid values: 0ACU to 2064ACU. The value must be in increments of the number of ACUs specified by the StorageResourceSize parameter Ã— 3 (default value: 24ACU). Each ACU is approximately equal to 1 core and 4 GB memory.

>  This parameter must be specified with a unit.

parameters.name: StorageResourceSize
parameters.description: The node specifications of reserved storage resources. Valid values: 8ACU, 12ACU, and 16ACU.
